data.text: Each player ship may take up to three actions during their turn. The pilot actions that may be taken are: {Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Draw 1 card or gain 1 resource. {Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Play an event or asset card from your hand. (Fast cards do not cost an action to play.) {Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Activate an {Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} ability on a card. {Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Move to a connecting quadrant. {Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Scan a card with your ship's {Abstract/rss_(1)} value. {Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Fight or Engage an enemy in your quadrant or a capital ship at your sector. {Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Attempt to Evade a Dogfight engaged with you. {Nature/power-lightning} or {Other/rapidshare_arrow} card abilities do not cost an action to activate. If you are engaged in a Dogfight with an enemy and spend an action to do anything other than Fight, Evade, or activate a Parley or Resign ability, each enemy engaged with you makes an attack of opportunity.
